website_summaries.verdict: A great value: this comfortable aid will help improve your accuracy without breaking your form.
pros: Can set for both right and left handed shooting
Good value on a basic release
Helps improve accuracy in your shooting
cons: If you are using it for hunting, you need to get it in place before you get in your stand

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for beginners and will serve its purpose for a release aid. I personally like the adjustments you can make with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for starters.
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. It was my first onne i ever used, so i didnt know what a better one was like. After about 10,000 + shots it failed on a draw back and thank god i had an arrow knoced. After getting a scoots release i relized that this one was not so sensitive as tge higher dollar release. If you just testing out the waters this is a good way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good product - I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The trigger is A little sensitive - Works just fine, I have adjusted mine out to be a little longer than most people and it works perfectly – good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Using a release is new to me. I bought a cheap one to try it out. It works, but I should have bought something that I know will last. Not saying there is anything wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick fix!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, he says it’s not too notch quality. I bought it for a quick fix for hunting season, his regular release is discontinued. He is ok with this one.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie J.

customer_reviews.title: It's good mainly made of metal so that's a plus
customer_reviews.text: It's good mainly made of metal so that's a plus. Only downside as several others have mentioned is that it's really sensitive so be careful when pulling back as the slightest brush will set it off and send a half drawn arrow god knows where.
customer_reviews.author: xavier valdez

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Trigger is a too sensitive. Just pay for a nice name brand $30-40 release. It’s well worth it and feels a million times better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Royal

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but very sensitive trigger.
customer_reviews.text: This is very well built for the price and does its job well. It did take me a while to get used to the super sensitive trigger. It is far more sensitive than any gun trigger. It basically the definition of a hair trigger. It could probably hold up a Canadian dime, but no more weight than that. I haven't actually had a misfire, so it seems to be just barely enough.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Raubenolt

customer_reviews.title: good product. And as always
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be careful when drawing the string with this, the trigger is VERY sensitive. Other than the potential for a misfire, good product. And as always, don't point at what you don't intend to destroy...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive trigger that surprises me on release much like gun trigger
customer_reviews.text: Have used this with 60 pound draw compound bow. very reliable basic release. Sensitive trigger that surprises me on release much like gun trigger.
customer_reviews.author: John A Duvenez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great release for target shooting and hunting. Ive had it over a year with no problem. I shoot 70lbs so this will handle heaver lb bows. If you are into bow hunting the velcro makes alot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: cant go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.text: lighter trigger release than the one I replaced, but any experienced archer should adapt quickly, yes Velcro is loud, put it on before you get to your hunting set.
customer_reviews.author: wyatte earpe

customer_reviews.title: Hair Trigger
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hair trigger and this thing doesn't disappoint. Do NOT let a child use this one. It's VERY sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: Release me, please!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my hand well, have it extended to the maximum length. Looks like good quality materials have been used. Haven't found anything to complain about. It's a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Baron Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a good price. Thanks for shipping so fast. Unfortunately haven't snagged a bucks with it yet. But that's on me not your product :/
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first release aid other than after a while u can feel the connector to the release at your wrist joint but that could be me with it too tight also, but I love it, no regrets if it breaks I'll update
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far, I agree with others that if you are new to using a trigger this one needs a light touch so until you are used to the light touch on the trigger be cautious
customer_reviews.author: JAE

customer_reviews.title: I really like the release
customer_reviews.text: I really like the release. The trigger is a bit touchy but once I got the feel for it I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix623

customer_reviews.title: Best Release Ever
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is a hair trigger, very sensitive. But when it's loaded with a pull it is very stout, I'd have it no other way. Metal construction not some cheap plastic release. Buy it, you will not be disappointed. There are a lot of releases out there, this one is the bomb. I will not buy another, only this one. I have shopped Bass Pro Shops and all my local sporting goods places, this one is THE BEST. get it stop looking.
customer_reviews.author: VampireRX

customer_reviews.title: Good product, don't waste your money on expensive version
customer_reviews.text: Great release. Don't spend money on more expensive ones this one does the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a jr. Archer. My son uses it and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: M_fromTX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: total value game changer. well worth the money compared to big brand guys
customer_reviews.author: BravoGator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little big for my 16yr old daughter but she will grow into it !
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: After one range session it broke and would release mid-draw. Very unsafe. Don’t cheap out on your release!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: it's very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: the trigger on this is quite touchy, but overall, it's very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: erti bimbashi

customer_reviews.title: Some gap
customer_reviews.text: Mine does not close all the way, is that normal?
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The release felt small. I could live with that but the trigger was way too sensitive. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Don O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Sensitive switch.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfying and easy to use. I have not had any issues with it yet. One heads up: the switch is very sensitive, I recommend keeping your finger behind it till you are at full draw and ready to shot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sensitive, will take a lot of practice getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: WN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the Velcro but over all good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a cheaper substitute, this quick release works great. Not as comfortable as the higher priced ones and also it does not feel as secure when holding the string. There is a tiny gap in the clasp which makes me nervous but other than that im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: S from Ga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great release. Can’t get any better than this for the prize.
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2x glove hand!
customer_reviews.text: Like the tripper, crisp harder pull than last release but I prefer that. I also have 2x glove hands and all the way out it is almost little too big. Allot of adjustment range. Also excellent price point, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mc'y T

customer_reviews.title: Nice trigger release
customer_reviews.text: Nice trigger release, smooth operation and has not failed to date. Have been using on my compound bow which is set at 73lb draw weight and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Intrepidusa

customer_reviews.title: very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Lower quality, and very very touchy. A slight bumb and it will release the arrow. I lost 1 arrow and 1 deer drawing back and it released mid draw because I bumped the release. I will save my money and get a higher quality release next time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Eppel

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very very very soft trigger, I would never use this it would be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SAS Adjustable Archery Release Aid
product_meta.description: Overview: Large Sized Velcro Wrist Strap for Adults. Features: Precision Trigger Adjustable Velcro Strap Caliper-Style for D-Loops Swivel Head Design for Right Or Left Hand Adjustable 5-Position Head Design
feature_bullets: Swivel Head Design for Right Or Left Hand

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
